articles.title: Widow of Ex-President of S. Korea Kim Dae Jung Arrives
articles.content:
Widow of Ex-President of S. Korea Kim Dae Jung Arrives
						
Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Ri Hui Ho, widow of ex-president of south Korea Kim Dae Jung, and her party arrived here Wednesday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Delegation
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from the visiting delegation of the Japan-DPRK friendship study for Juche.
					 It was handed over to an official concerned by head of the delegation Masaji Ie, co-representative of the Japanese National Liaison Council of Societies for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, on Wednesday.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Vietnam Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Vietnam Appointed
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Myong Gil was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Vietnam, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: City, County Rallies Held in Response to Appeal Made by Participants in Conference of War Veterans
articles.content:
City, County Rallies Held in Response to Appeal Made by Participants in Conference of War Veterans
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- City and county rallies took place in response to the appeal made by the participants of the 4th National Conference of War Veterans.
					 Present there were officials of local party, power and economic bodies, working people's organizations, industrial establishments and co-op farms, people from all walks of life and youth and students.
					
					 Senior officials of the relevant units read out the appeal to be followed by speeches to renew pledges.
					
					 Speakers called for devotedly defending the Party Central Committee and working miracles and innovations in the production and construction, firmly convinced that the cause of national reunification and that of building a thriving nation are sure to be accomplished under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The representatives of workers vowed to creditably fulfill their revolutionary duties in the all-out offensive for the final victory in the confrontation with the U.S. and in the drive for building a thriving nation by carrying forward the indomitable fighting spirit displayed by the workers of the old generation in increasing production in wartime, true to the idea and leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The representatives of agricultural workers pledged to widely introduce scientific farming methods and make a fresh leap forward in agricultural production, true to the noble intention of the Party which considers the agricultural front as the first line trench of the first echelon in defending socialism, and thus glorify for all ages the history of bumper harvest on this land protected by grandfathers and fathers with their lives during the past Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Speakers also renewed their determination to turn out as one in the forest restoration campaign to turn all mountains into thick woods by enshrining Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Seminar in Field of Social Sciences Held
articles.content:
Seminar in Field of Social Sciences Held
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- There took place a seminar in the field of social sciences to roundly expose the crimes committed by Japan in the past.
					 It heard a series of papers.
					
					 Speakers slammed the shameless Japanese authorities for having refused to redress their past crimes while talking about the "legality of "Ulsa (1905) Five-point Treaty" and cited facts to prove its illegality and invalidity.
					
					 They branded the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army as a war crime unprecedented in history and the worst state-sponsored crime against humanity.
					
					 They cited facts to prove that the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army was the state-sponsored crime committed by the Japanese government and military.
					
					 Defeated Japan has refused to properly probe the truth about the incident of Ukishima-maru, far from reflecting on the crimes it committed against the Korean people, making a clean sheet and making an apology and reparation for them, they noted, adding: 
					
					 This incident was part of mass killings of forcibly drafted Koreans committed at the tacit connivance of the Japanese authorities and under their patronage. 
					
					 Japan's occupation of Korea and atrocities committed during its colonial rule are the hideous state-sponsored crimes and crimes against humanity to which no statute of limitations is applicable. 
					
					 It is the legal obligation of Japan to make apology and reparation for its crimes and liquidate them.
					
					 The speakers urged Japan to clearly understand the will of the Korean people and sincerely redress its past crimes at an early date.

articles.title: National Children's Paduk Contest Held
articles.content:
National Children's Paduk Contest Held
 Hamhung, August 5 (KCNA) -- The 4th National Children's Paduk Contest was held in Hamhung, South Hamgyong Province from July 30 to August 5.
					 It brought together more than 120 children selected from across the country. It was divided into the first category (first and second year classes of primary schools) and the second category (under high classes of kindergartens).
					
					 The players demonstrated reading of correct numbers, concentration and patience.
					
					 Pyongyang city placed first at the contest.

articles.title: DPRK's Yang Kyong Il Tops World Freestyle Wrestling Standings
articles.content:
DPRK's Yang Kyong Il Tops World Freestyle Wrestling Standings
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Yang Kyong Il of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea topped the world standings in men's 57 kg freestyle wrestling, according to an announcement recently issued by the United World Wrestling.
					 Yang, a wrestler of the Ryongnamsan Sports Team in the DPRK, is the twice world championship holder. He took the men's 55kg and 57kg freestyle wrestling titles at the World Wrestling Championship held in 2009 and 2014.
					
					 He won bronze medal in the men's 55kg freestyle wrestling of the 30th Olympic Games and proved successful at the Asian Wrestling Championship in 2011 and other international tournaments.
					
					 He was selected as one of the ten best players of the DPRK in 2009, 2011, 2012 and 2014.

articles.title: DPRK Women's Football Team Beats Its Chinese Rival
articles.content:
DPRK Women's Football Team Beats Its Chinese Rival
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The DPRK women's football team beat its Chinese rival 3:2 at the 2015 EAFF East Asia Cup on Tuesday.
					 Kim Yun Mi of the DPRK team scored a goal at around 5th minute.
					
					 Wi Jong Sim scored goals respectively at around 24th and 69th minutes.

articles.title: Red Flag Relay of KPA Servicepersons Goes on
articles.content:
Red Flag Relay of KPA Servicepersons Goes on
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The red flag relay of servicepersons of the Korean People's Army that kicked off to mark the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation is going on.
					 They visited the Monument to the Victorious Battle in Musan Area on Aug. 3, where they renewed their immutable will to firmly ensure the victory of the Korean revolution with arms, and arrived at Chongjin, North Hamgyong Province by running faster.
					
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in the city and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They looked round the rooms devoted to the education in revolutionary history and others of a KPA unit visited by the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 On Wednesday they went round the cemetery of the KPA navy men who died heroic death while performing their combat duties. 
					
					 They placed bunches of flowers before the cemetery and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Then, there took place a meeting to learn about the greatness of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kyongsong Ceramic Factory under Reconstruction
articles.content:
Kyongsong Ceramic Factory under Reconstruction
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The reconstruction of the Kyongsong Ceramic Factory progresses apace in North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK.
					 The factory is associated with the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Its coal gas generator and 70-meter tunnel kiln are being remodeled with the help of the State Academy of Sciences and Kim Chaek University of Technology.
					
					 The reconstruction includes more than 10 projects, among them renovation of the main production building.

articles.title: Spirit of Defending Country in 1950s Is Weapon for Victory: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Spirit of Defending Country in 1950s Is Weapon for Victory: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The victory in the Fatherland Liberation War was not an accidental one but an inevitable one brought about in the spirit of defending the country that the army and people of the DPRK displayed, guided by the original military idea and Juche-oriented war method of President Kim Il Sung and under his outstanding and tested leadership.  
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 The spirit of defending the country that was created amid the flames of war was the greatest one that cannot match any physical force.
					
					 The victory in the Fatherland Liberation War helped the DPRK emerge as heroic Korea and miraculous country which brought about the beginning of a downhill turn for the U.S. imperialists and prevented a new world war.
					
					 The spirit which carried forward the revolutionary spirit of Paektu highly demonstrated the spirit of heroic Korea that has won a victory after another in the confrontation with the U.S. over the past 60 odd years and aroused all the service personnel and people to a dynamic and heroic struggle for accelerating the final victory.
					
					 The fierce war without gunfire has been persisting century after century on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are the victors in the unprecedented showdown with the U.S. 
					
					 It is the steadfast will of the army and people of the DPRK to hold fast to the spirit of defending the country in the 1950s as an ideological and mental weapon for glorifying the ever-victorious history and tradition of heroic Korea, put an end to the confrontation with the U.S. and achieve the historic cause of the country's reunification.
					
					 The powerful revolutionary Paektusan army is capable of fighting any war, operation and battle which the U.S. imperialists may want and choose and is ready to go into a war whether it is one by conventional armed forces or a nuclear war.
					
					 No force on earth can prevent the army and people of the DPRK from advancing with the revolutionary spirit of Paektu and the spirit of defending the country in the 1950s as a weapon for victory.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses True Colors of U.S. as Nuclear Criminal
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses True Colors of U.S. as Nuclear Criminal
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- A high-ranking official of the U.S. federation of scientists recently opened to the public the fact that the U.S. is developing the first guided nuclear bomb and carried out a test on it. According to it, the test was conducted in a nuclear test ground in Nevada State on July 1 by way of dropping "B61-12" nuclear bomb in which guidance system is installed. The test was reportedly aimed to increase its veracity. The U.S. is mulling conducting two more similar tests this year.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a commentary in this regards:
					
					 This indicates that the U.S. has steadily modernized its nuclear arsenal while crying out for building "a world without nuclear weapons" behind.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which is getting pronounced in its attempt to mount preemptive nuclear attacks on other countries after deploying huge nuclear force in various parts of the world.
					
					 Lurking behind its ceaseless nuclear tests is the aim to contain the countries it regards as its potential enemy by dint of its unchallenged nuclear edge and hold military supremacy. That is why the U.S. has developed, produced and modernized fresh nuclear weapons nonstop by spending a large amount of funds.
					
					 It admits of no argument that the U.S. is the chief criminal posing a nuclear threat to the world and sparking off arms race.
					
					 The U.S. is bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over humankind.
					
					 It should bear due responsibility for it.
					
					 With nothing can it cover up its true colors as a nuclear war criminal.

articles.title: Minju Joson Terms U.S. Incarnation of Evils, Worst Human Rights Abuser
articles.content:
Minju Joson Terms U.S. Incarnation of Evils, Worst Human Rights Abuser
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- According to data recently exposed by WikiLeaks, the U.S. National Security Agency wiretapped phones of 20 senior diplomats of Germany including the foreign minister and a councilor of the Foreign Ministry.
					 Among those documents opened to public by whistleblower website WikiLeaks are a report worked out by the U.S. after eavesdropping phone talks held by the German foreign minister during his visit to the U.S. in 2005.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Wednesday says it is the U.S. which is mercilessly doing harm to its allies in order to realize its sinister purpose and talking volumes about "freedom" and "human rights" in the eyes of the world but violating human rights and perpetrating the worst things behind the curtain.
					
					 It is the American view of value and Yankee-style way of thinking to trample down even one's allies and masters for the sake of one's interests, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 As it approached the world with such gangster-like logic, the U.S. has resorted to high-handed and arbitrary practices in every part of the world and committed the worst things in disregard of its allies only to be unanimously cursed and accused by the international community.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which is a lonely country with no sincere allies, an international orphan who has no its friend. Indeed, it is pitiful.
					
					 The U.S. is criticized and rejected by not only anti-U.S. independent countries but its allies as it is the incarnation of evils and worst human rights abuser in the world.

articles.title: Legal Punishment of Chief Executive Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Legal Punishment of Chief Executive Called for in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The April 16 Solidarity of south Korea, civic organization struggling for the probe into the truth about ferry Sewol disaster, called a press conference at Kwanghwamun Plaza, Seoul on August 1, demanding punishment of the puppet chief executive.
					 Speakers said that data on the disaster and other documents have evidence enough to hold Chongwadae and the present chief executive legally accountable for the disaster.
					
					 Park Geun Hye and others related to the disaster deserve legal punishment, they noted, deploring the "government" disturbing the activities of the special committee for probing the truth about ferry Sewol disaster in every way while refusing to pay heed to the voices of the people.

articles.title: Earthquake Hits Waters off Jeju Island, S. Korea
articles.content:
Earthquake Hits Waters off Jeju Island, S. Korea
						
  Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- An earthquake measuring 3.7 on the Richter scale occurred in waters near Jeju Island, south Korea on Aug 3, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 It was reported that the epicenter was in waters 22km southeast of Songsan, Sogwipho City, Jeju Province.

articles.title: Pyongyang International Airport Introduced by Paper of Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Pyongyang International Airport Introduced by Paper of Overseas Koreans
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Thongil, a paper of the International United Confederation of Koreans, carried a special write-up on July 23.
					 The paper carried an article illustrated with photos showing the interior of the new terminal of Pyongyang International Airport.
					
					 The article said that supreme leader Kim Jong Un gave field guidance to the terminal.
					
					 It noted that the ceremony for the completion of the terminal took place on July 1.

articles.title: V-Day of Korean People Observed Abroad
articles.content:
V-Day of Korean People Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Foreign websites observed the 62nd anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War from July 24 to 27.
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted on its website an article titled "Peerless strategist" illustrated with a photo dealing with President Kim Il Sung's revolutionary activities.
					
					 The miraculous victory achieved by the young DPRK in the hard-fought war against the imperialist allied forces led by the U.S. with the strongest military muscle and economic power and the longest history of aggression in the world was a fruition of the outstanding strategies, tactics and unique war methods of the President, the article said.
					
					 An article posted on a website of Irkutsk, Russia said:
					
					 There was an event baffling imagination of people in the East 62 years ago. The U.S. which had boasted of being the "strongest" in the world bent its knees before the young DPRK.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website an article, which said the Korean people achieved victories in the two revolutionary wars and the socialist construction by staging arduous and heroic struggle unprecedented in history by dint of ideology under the wise leadership of the President.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Indonesia
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Indonesia
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of the Indonesian preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and the liberation of Korea took place at the Soekarno Foundation for Education on July 29.
					 Rachmawati Soekarnoputri, chairwoman of the Founding Committee of the Soekarno Foundation for Education, was elected chairwoman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the celebration period from August 1 to October 15 and decided to hold colorful political and cultural events including a ceremony of adopting a congratulatory message to supreme leader Kim Jong Un, seminar and film show.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Cambodia
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Cambodia
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- A Cambodian preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the liberation of Korea was formed on August 1.
					 Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the instructions of King Norodom Sihamoni.
					
					 The committee set the period for celebrating the liberation of Korea from August 1 to August 20 and the period for celebrating the founding of the WPK from October 1 to October 20 and decided to give wide publicity to the immortal exploits and the revolutionary careers of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the feats performed by them in developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and organize colorful political and cultural events.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Egypt
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Egypt
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- An Egyptian national preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and the liberation of Korea was formed on August 1.
					 Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt who doubles as chairman of the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the celebration period from August 1 to October 10 and decided to hold political and cultural events including a seminar, meeting, photo exhibition and film show.

articles.title: V-Day of Korean People Observed by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
V-Day of Korean People Observed by Foreign Papers
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Papers of various countries carried articles to observe the 62nd anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The Kuwaiti paper Al-Anba in an article illustrated with a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un said:
					
					 Under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung the service personnel and people of the DPRK beat back the aggression by the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces by displaying popular heroism and matchless bravery, defended freedom and independence of the country and thus built a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 It is ascribable to the wise guidance of the leader and inheritance of the great spirit and traditions that the DPRK has emerged a strong country in the world.
					
					 The DPRK has a proud history of struggle in which it firmly defended its freedom and independence, sovereignty and dignity.
					
					 The Syrian paper Tishrin in an article titled "DPRK marking V-Day, tenacity with which it fought against outrageous U.S." said the service personnel and people of the DPRK worked a miracle of humbling the U.S. imperialists and shattered the myth of their "mightiness" in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 The Venezuelan paper Vea said if the U.S. ignites a new war, oblivious of the lesson drawn from its defeat in the past Korean war, it will meet the final ruin, not merely a defeat.

articles.title: En Pyongyang Ri Hui Ho y su comitiva
articles.content:
En Pyongyang Ri Hui Ho y su comitiva 
						
Pyongyang, 5 de agosto (ACNC) -- Llegaron el dia 5 a esta capital Ri Hui Ho, esposa del ex presidente del Sur de Corea, Kim Dae Jung, y su comitiva.

articles.title: Nombrado nuevo embajador de RPDC a acreditarse en Vietnam
articles.content:
Nombrado nuevo embajador de RPDC a acreditarse en Vietnam
						
Pyongyang, 5 de agosto (ACNC) -- Segun un decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Myong Gil fue nombrado como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la RPDC a acreditarse en la Republica Socialista de Vietnam.

articles.title: Tienen lugar mitines en ciudades y distritos
articles.content:
Tienen lugar mitines en ciudades y distritos
						
Pyongyang, 5 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar los mitines multitudinarios en las ciudades y distritos en respuesta al llamamiento de los participantes en la IV Conferencia Nacional de Veteranos de Guerra con la participacion de los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, el poder y la economia, entidades de masas, fabricas,  empresas y granjas cooperativas, trabajadores de distintos estratos, jovenes y estudiantes en las localidades.
					En los mitines se dio lectura al llamamiento e intervinieron.
					
					ã€€Los oradores subrayaron la necesidad de defender a costa de la vida el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y crear milagros e innovaciones en la produccion y construccion guardando en lo profundo de corazon la conviccion ferrea de que sea realizada sin falta la causa de la reunificacion de la patria y de la construccion de un Estado prospero bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Expresaron decisiones de cumplir el deber revolucionario en las labores para lograr la victoria final en la batalla de confrontacion con Estados Unidos y la construccion de un Estado prospero sucediendo el indoblegable espiritu de lucha de los obreros de la anterior generacion que quedaron fieles a la idea y la direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung sobre el aumento de la produccion en el tiempo de la guerra.
					
					Destacaron que en pleno acato al noble proposito del PTC que presento el frente de agricultura como primera linea de defensa del socialismo, deben aplicar activamente los metodos cientificos de agricultura, dar nuevos saltos en la produccion agricola y hacer brillar de generacion en generacion nueva historia de buenas cosechas en esta tierra defendida con la vida por las generaciones de abuelos y padres durante la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					
					Exhortaron a levantarse como un solo hombre a la campana de la reforestacion forestal en todas las montanas guardando en el corazon el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Sector de ciencias sociales revela crimenes pasados de Japon
articles.content:
Sector de ciencias sociales revela crimenes pasados de Japon
						
Pyongyang, 5 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 5 el seminario del sector de ciencias sociales para condenar los crimenes pasados del Japon.
					En el acto se presentaron las disertaciones intituladas "Ilegalidad e invalidez del 'Tratado de 5 puntos de Ulsa' inventado por los imperialistas japoneses", "Crimenes inolvidables que convirtieron a las mujeres coreanas en la victima del regimen de esclava sexual de las tropas japonesas", "Hundimiento del barco japones 'Ukishima maru' por explosion es una masacre de los coreanos detenidos por coercion, intencionalmente planificada y cometida por las autoridades japonesas" y "Japon debe pedir disculpa e indemnizar sobre los crimenes de toda indole cometidos en Corea".
					
					Los oradores revelaron con datos la ilegalidad e invalidez del "Tratado de 5 puntos", tras condenar los actos descarados de las autoridades japonesas que niegan obstinadamente a la liquidacion del pasado hablando de la "legalidad" del "tratado".
					
					Senalaron que el acto de esclava sexual de las tropas japoneses es el delito de guerra y el crimen antietico estatal sin precedente en la historia oriental y occidental.
					
					Argumentaron con los materiales reales que el dicho crimen fue perpetrado de modo organizativo por el gobierno y la capa militar del pais isleno.
					
					Agregaron que hasta la fecha desde su derrota Japon no pide disculpa ni hace indemnizacion por sus crimenes perpetrados ante el pueblo coreano para dar nuevos pasos a su historia. En particular, el caso de hundimiento arriba mencionado es la prolongacion de la masacre contra los coreanos secuestrados por el trabajo forzoso en Japon, perpetrada bajo el amparo y la tolerancia de las autoridades japonesas.
					
					Enfatizaron que la ocupacion de Japon a Corea y los crimenes cometidos en ese periodo son los archicrimenes antieticos que no tiene prescripcion y enfatizaron en que Japon tiene el deber juridico de pedir disculpa, indemnizar y liquidacion del pasado.
					
					Japon debe tener en cuenta clara esta voluntad del pueblo coreano y liquidar lo mas pronto posible su pasado lleno de crimenes.

articles.title: Yang Kyong Il ocupa primer lugar en orden mundial
articles.content:
Yang Kyong Il ocupa primer lugar en orden mundial
						
Pyongyang, 5 de agosto (ACNC) -- Hace poco, la Union Mundial de Lucha publico el orden mundial de los luchadores por categorias de peso.
					Segun ello, el jugador Yang Kyong Il de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ocupo el primer lugar en la categoria de 57kg (m) de lucha libre.
					
					Yang, jugador del Conjunto Deportivo de Ryongnamsan, es el bicampeon mundial como Kim Chol Hwan, Kim Yong Sik y Ri Jae Sik que fueron estrellas en la esfera de lucha del siglo XX. El gano las medallas de oro respectivamente en la division de 55kg de lucha libre del Campeonato Mundial de Lucha 2009 y en la division de 57kg de lucha libre del mismo campeonato efectuado en 2014.
					
					Y recibio la medalla de cobre en el juego de categoria de 55kg de lucha libre de los XXX Juegos Olimpicos.
					
					Ademas, logro los exitos sobresalientes en varias competencias internacionales inclusive el Campeonato Asiatico de Lucha 2011.
					
					Fue elegido como uno de los 10 mejores jugadores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en el ano 2009, 2011, 2012 y 2014.
					
					El pueblo coreano espera que los jugadores como Yang Kyong Il obtengan muchas medallas de oro en los XXXI Juegos Olimpicos que se efectuaran en el proximo ano.
